messages.title: NHS - Saved My Life.
messages.content: Stephen Kearney fighting for the NHS. Stephen Kearney is committed to ensuring the NHS can give the best care possible to patients like him.

messages.title: Conservative plan to slash pay for our nurses
messages.content: The Tories' plan to cut nurses' pay means our most important professionals care even less, and ultimately could mean they are forced into unwelcome decisions.

messages.title: A Promise of More.
messages.content: The Lib Dem plan for a Stronger Economy: Better pensions, An income tax cut, Tackling the deficit.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: £8 billion a year extra for the NHS
keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Lib Dems are planning to increase spending on the NHS by £8 billion a year and will establish a health and care fund by creating a penny in the pound on Income Tax.
Provided an extra £2.5 billion per year for struggling schools.
From 2010-2015, reducing borrowing by £30 billion for ordinary families and from 2016-2020, finishing the job of balancing the books, on time and fairly.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: The Lib Dem plan for a Stronger Economy
keyPolicies.policyDescription: The pledge to provide better pensions, an income tax cut, and to tackle the deficit.

mentions.candidate: Stephen Kearney is fighting for the NHS.

issues.economy: The Lib Dem plan for a Stronger Economy includes better pensions, an income tax cut, and tackling the deficit.
issues.education: Providing an extra £2.5 billion per year for struggling schools.
issues.health: The NHS - Saved Stephen Kearney's life. The Lib Dems are planning to increase spending on the NHS by £8 billion a year and will establish a health and care fund by creating a penny in the pound on Income Tax.

images.caption: £8 billion a year extra for the NHS
The Lib Dem plan for a Stronger Economy
